entry.title: https://github.com/Open4Es/Open4Es-Shader-Android
entry.content: This is a shader can running on Minecraft Java Edition For Phone project which uses GL4ES. This repository contains source code for Android platform.

entry.title: https://github.com/PoeticRainbow/golden-days
entry.content: Golden Days is a Minecraft resource pack meant to bring back old textures, lighting, names, and sounds from older versions of Minecraft.
